meta.@content: Osa-II, missile boat, patrol craft, SAVAGE, X3D
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding

3-shaft propulsion system to include shafts, propellers, and struts. Basis for shafts and propellers taken from James Harney DDG model (see reference).
Switch added to turn off water for easy inlining.
